subject: Simsonn Manager Update
description_text:
Good morning,

I am having issues updating my Manager to 2.0.5.  The update will download, but as soon as I select update, the program turns off.  After waiting for a few mintues, I select the program to turn it on and it's asking to download the update again.  Is their a way to manually update or can you send me a link to download the update and install?

Thank you,

James Waring

conversations.body_text: Hi，James Waring，  ​You can directly download and install version 2.0.8.  https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hi James Waring,    I noticed you purchased the VAM Pro 3 pcs Set and Pro X Ultra control boxes, what pedals are you using now. If it's not a Pro X pedal, we'll replace it with a Plus X control box and refund the difference since they work the same for pedals other than the Pro X.  Since we don't plan on selling the Pro X Ultra box separately, we don't have a packaging solution for it, so choosing the Plus X box will make it easier for us to ship it in one package with the VAM Pro Set.

I have the Pro X pedals currently.

Thank You,

James Waring, NRP, CCP, A.A.,A.S.
(352) 255-1064

“Clients do not come first. Employees come first. If you take care of your
employees, they will take care of the clients.” - Sir Richard Branson


On Thu, Jul 17, 2025 at 11:04 PM service@simsonn.com

Hi James Waring,     Please download the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.0.9. For telemetry, you can use either our official software or SIMHUB 9.9.3 — both are compatible with our pedal system.    https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
